TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Configuration extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示适用于特定计算机、应用程序或资源的配置文件。

span.span: Represents a configuration file that is applicable to a particular computer, application, or resource.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置设置存储在配置文件的层次结构。Configuration settings are stored in a hierarchy of configuration files. 类实例表示的合并的视图，从所有应用于特定的物理实体，如一台计算机，或逻辑实体，如应用程序或网站的配置文件的配置设置。The class instance represents the merged view of the configuration settings from all of the configuration files that apply to a specific physical entity, such as a computer, or to a logical entity, such as an application or a Web site. 在本地计算机或远程服务器上，可以存在逻辑实体。The logical entity can exist on the local computer or on a remote server. 有关配置文件的信息，请参阅[配置应用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f)和[ASP.NET 配置文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01505090-9114-41a7-93ca-068e2283ed3d)。For information about configuration files, see [Configuring Apps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f) and [ASP.NET Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01505090-9114-41a7-93ca-068e2283ed3d). 当配置文件不存在为指定的实体，对象表示由 Machine.config 文件中定义的默认配置设置。When no configuration file exists for a specified entity, the object represents the default configuration settings as defined by the Machine.config file. 你可以获取通过使用以下类的对象：You can get a object by using the following classes: - 类，如果你的实体为客户端应用程序。The class, if your entity is a client application. - 类，如果你的实体是一个 Web 应用程序。The class, if your entity is a Web application. 返回方法的名称对象开头"打开"。The names of the methods that return a object begin with "Open". 你还可以生成表示中的配置设置的配置文件对象。You can also generate a configuration file that represents the configuration settings in a object. 若要执行此操作，请使用以下方法之一：To do this, use one of the following methods: - 调用方法来创建新的配置文件。Call the method to create a new configuration file. - 调用方法来生成新的配置文件在另一个位置。Call the method to generate a new configuration file at another location. 创建配置文件的方法的名称开头"保存"。The names of the methods that create configuration files begin with "Save". > [!NOTE] > 若要启用对远程计算机上的配置设置的访问，使用 Aspnet_regiis 命令行工具。To enable access to configuration settings on a remote computer, use the Aspnet_regiis command-line tool. 有关此工具的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET IIS 注册工具 (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b)。For more information about this tool, see [ASP.NET IIS Registration Tool (Aspnet_regiis.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6491c41e-e2b0-481f-9863-db3614d5f96b). 有关创建和访问包含在.NET Framework 中的固有部分以外的自定义配置设置的信息，请参阅。For information about creating and accessing custom configuration settings other than the intrinsic sections included in the .NET Framework, refer to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用访问配置文件元素的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to access configuration file elements. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#31)]

block.para:
类提供了进行编程访问以编辑配置文件。
The class provides programmatic access for editing configuration files.
使用提供的"打开"方法之一类，用于 Web 应用程序或通过客户端应用程序的类。
You use one of the "Open" methods provided by the class for Web applications or by the class for client applications.
这些方法返回对象，它又提供的方法和处理基础的配置文件的属性。
These methods return a object, which in turn provides the methods and properties that handle the underlying configuration files.
你可以访问这些文件进行读取或写入配置信息。
You can access these files for reading or writing configuration information.
你使用方法或方法来读取配置信息。
You use the method or the method to read configuration information.
请注意的用户或读取的进程必须具有以下权限：
Note that the user or process that reads must have the following permissions:
- 读取当前配置层次结构级别上对配置文件的权限。Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 读取所有父权限配置文件。Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.如果你的应用程序需要其自己的配置只读访问，建议你使用Web 应用程序的方法重载。If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, it is recommended that you use the method overloads for Web applications.对于客户端应用程序使用方法。For client application, use the method.这些方法提供了访问当前应用程序的缓存的配置值，具有更好的性能比类。These methods provide access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.
如果你使用静态带 path 参数的方法，path 参数必须引用的应用程序在其中运行代码，否则将忽略此参数并返回的当前运行的应用程序的配置信息。If you use a static method that takes a path parameter, the path parameter must refer to the application in which the code is running, otherwise the parameter is ignored and configuration information for the currently running application is returned.使用之一方法来写入配置信息。You use one of the methods to write configuration information.请注意的用户或写入的进程必须具有以下权限：Note that the user or process that writes must have the following permissions:
- 写入权限的配置文件和当前配置层次结构级别上的目录。Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 对所有配置文件读取权限。Read permissions on all the configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppSettings As AppSettingsSection
public: property System::Configuration::AppSettingsSection ^ AppSettings { System::Configuration::AppSettingsSection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取应用于此 对象的 对象配置节。

span.span: Gets the object configuration section that applies to this object.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示应用于此 对象 配置节。

span.span: An object representing the configuration section that applies to this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问和更改`appSettings`默认情况下，打开配置文件中定义的配置节。Use the property to access and change the `appSettings` configuration section defined by default in the open configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AssemblyStringTransformer As Func(Of String, String)

public: property Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ AssemblyStringTransformer { Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定一个函数委托，用于转换配置文件中的程序集字符串。

span.span: Specifies a function delegate that is used to transform assembly strings in configuration files.

value.span: 一个用于转换类型字符串的委托。

span.span: A delegate that transforms type strings.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性支持.NET Framework 配置系统的用户设置一个函数委托，用于转换在配置文件中找到的程序集字符串。This property enables a consumer of the .NET Framework configuration system to set a function delegate that is used to transform assembly strings found in configuration files. [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 在项目所面向的.NET framework 早期版本时，请使用此属性。 uses this property when a project is targeted for an earlier version of the .NET Framework. 该函数可确保，程序集字符串的格式正确的.NET framework 目标版本更新的配置文件时。The function makes sure that assembly strings are formatted correctly for the targeted version of the .NET Framework when configuration files are updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此值为属性表示的合并的视图和应用程序的实际文件不存在，则返回父配置文件的路径。If the value for this property represents a merged view and no actual file exists for the application, the path to the parent configuration file is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置设置包含在组一起为方便起见类似设置的部分。Configuration settings are contained within sections that group similar settings together for convenience. 方法检索的配置节按其名称。The method retrieves a configuration section by its name. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来访问自定义的部分。The following example shows how to use the method to access a custom section. 定义存储信息的类的完整示例代码`CustomSection`部分中，请参阅类概述。For the complete example code that defines a class that stores information for the `CustomSection` section, see the class overview. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由此 对象表示的资源是否存在相应的文件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a file exists for the resource represented by this object.

value.span: 如果该配置文件存在，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if there is a configuration file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性也会返回`true`由此表示的资源时对象从 Web.config 文件中继承设置。The property also returns `true` when the resource represented by this object inherits settings from a Web.config file. 属性返回`false`时这对象表示特定位置的配置。The property returns `false` when this object represents a location-specific configuration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Locations As ConfigurationLocationCollection

summary.span: 获取此 对象内定义的位置。

span.span: Gets the locations defined within this object.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含此 对象内定义的位置。

span.span: A containing the locations defined within this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性适用时，才属性返回`true`。The property applies only when the property returns `true`. 如果此配置继承所有设置，或未定义位置，则返回空集合。If this configuration inherits all of its settings, or no locations are defined, an empty collection is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NamespaceDeclared { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示配置文件是否具有 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the configuration file has an XML namespace.

value.span: 如果配置文件有 XML 命名空间，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the configuration file has an XML namespace; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件的格式为 XML 文件，但不需要的 XML 命名空间。Configuration files are formatted as XML files, but an XML namespace is not required. 如果此值为`true`后对象已打开，则该文件包含的命名空间引用。If this value is `true` after the object is opened, then the file contains a namespace reference. 如果设置为`true`之前保存对象，然后命名空间引用将添加到文件。If it is set to `true` before the object is saved, then a namespace reference will be added to the file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RootSectionGroup As ConfigurationSectionGroup

summary.span: 获取此 对象的根 。

span.span: Gets the root for this object.
The root section group for this object.

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入当前 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入当前 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于保持以来修改过的任何配置设置创建对象。The method persists any configuration settings that have been modified since this object was created. 如果配置文件不存在所表示的物理位置属性，新的配置文件将创建包含不同于继承的配置的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果配置文件后这已更改创建对象时，将发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 包含配置文件的当前用户的目录 ACL （访问控制列表） 中列出的创建者所有者时将成为该文件的新所有者和继承的创建者所有者授予的权限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 这会导致为当前用户的权限提升和之前的所有者的特权删除。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner.

exception.span: 无法对配置文件执行写入操作。

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
\- or -
The configuration file has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode saveMode) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void Save(valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode mode) cil managed

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入当前 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the current XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于保持中的配置设置对象基于`saveMode`参数。The method persists configuration settings in the object based on the `saveMode` parameter. 如果配置文件不存在所表示的物理位置属性，新的配置文件将创建包含不同于继承的配置的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果配置文件后这已更改创建对象时，将发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 包含配置文件的当前用户的目录 ACL （访问控制列表） 中列出的创建者所有者时将成为该文件的新所有者和继承的创建者所有者授予的权限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 这会导致为当前用户的权限提升和之前的所有者的特权删除。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来保存自定义的部分。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to save a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#2)]

exception.span: 无法对配置文件执行写入操作。

span.span: The configuration file could not be written to.
\- or -
The configuration file has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于保持中的配置设置对象基于`saveMode`和`forceSaveAll`参数。The method persists configuration settings in the object based on the `saveMode` and `forceSaveAll` parameters. 如果配置文件不存在所表示的物理位置属性，新的配置文件将创建包含不同于继承的配置的任何设置...If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration.. 如果配置文件后这已更改创建对象时，将发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 包含配置文件的当前用户的目录 ACL （访问控制列表） 中列出的创建者所有者时将成为该文件的新所有者和继承的创建者所有者授予的权限。When 'Creator Owner' is listed in the ACL (Access Control List) of the directory containing the configuration file, the current user of becomes the new owner of the file and inherits the permissions granted to 'Creator Owner'. 这会导致为当前用户的权限提升和之前的所有者的特权删除。This results in an elevation of privileges for the current user and a removal of privileges for the previous owner.

The configuration file has changed.

span.span: The path and file name to save the configuration file to.

summary.span: 将包含在此 对象中的配置设置写入指定的 XML 配置文件。

span.span: Writes the configuration settings contained within this object to the specified XML configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于保持中的配置设置到新文件的对象基于`saveMode`和`forceSaveAll`参数。The method persists configuration settings in the object to a new file based on the `saveMode` and `forceSaveAll` parameters. 如果配置文件不存在所表示的物理位置属性，新的配置文件将创建包含不同于继承的配置的任何设置。If a configuration file does not exist at the physical location represented by the property, a new configuration file will be created to contain any settings that are different from the inherited configuration. 如果配置文件后这已更改创建对象时，将发生运行时错误。If the configuration file has changed since this object was created, a run-time error occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#4)]

exception.span: 为 null 或为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: is null or an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SectionGroups As ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取由此配置定义的节组的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the section groups defined by this configuration.

value.span: 一个 集合，该集合表示此 对象的节组集合。

span.span: A collection representing the collection of section groups for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置节可以组合到组，为方便起见，以及添加功能。Configuration sections can be combined into groups for convenience and added functionality. 访问属性，以检索对象，表示此节组集合对象。Access the property to retrieve the object representing the collection of section groups for this object. 如果此对象表示的继承的视图，就将返回节组合并的列表。If this object represents an inherited view, the merged list of section groups will be returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Sections As ConfigurationSectionCollection

summary.span: 获取此 对象定义的节的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the sections defined by this object.

value.span: 此 对象定义的节的集合。

span.span: A collection of the sections defined by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问属性，以检索表示此节的集合对象对象。Access the property to retrieve a object representing the collection of sections for this object. 如果此对象表示合并的配置，就将返回的节合并的列表。If this object represents a merged configuration, the merged list of sections will be returned. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索属性值并显示集合中的节的数目。The following example shows how to retrieve the property value and to display the number of the sections in the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.Configuration#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/CS/Configuration.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.Configuration#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.Configuration/VB/Configuration.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ TargetFramework { System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ get(); void set(System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ value); };

summary.span: 在将当前版本之前的某个版本作为目标时，指定 .NET Framework 的目标版本。

span.span: Specifies the targeted version of the .NET Framework when a version earlier than the current one is targeted.

value.span: .NET Framework 的目标版本的名称。

span.span: The name of the targeted version of the .NET Framework.

value.span: 默认值为 ，它指示将当前版本作为目标。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that the current version is targeted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当配置系统序列化到 XML 的配置对象的层次结构时，它会检查此属性的值。When the configuration system serializes a hierarchy of configuration objects to XML, it checks the value of this property. 如果该属性不`null`，配置系统会针对每个配置节组和配置节执行版本检查。If the property is not `null`, the configuration system performs version checks for each configuration section group and configuration section. 配置系统还会执行版本检查标记为已更改版本间的单独的配置属性。The configuration system also performs version checks for individual configuration properties that are marked as having changed across versions. （有关详细信息，请参阅 。）配置系统还会执行版本检查的配置节中的配置元素。(For more information, see .) The configuration system also performs version checks for configuration elements in configuration sections. 如果此属性的值是`null`，配置系统在序列化过程不执行任何版本检查。If the value of this property is `null`, the configuration system does not perform any version checks during serialization.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TypeStringTransformer As Func(Of String, String)
public: property Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ TypeStringTransformer { Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定一个函数委托，用于转换配置文件中的类型字符串。

span.span: Specifies a function delegate that is used to transform type strings in configuration files.

value.span: 一个用于转换类型字符串的委托。

span.span: A delegate that transforms type strings.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性支持.NET Framework 配置系统的用户设置一个函数委托，用于转换类型字符串在配置文件中找到。This property enables a consumer of the .NET Framework configuration system to set a function delegate that is used to transform type strings found in configuration files. [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 在项目所面向的.NET framework 早期版本时，请使用此属性。 uses this property when a project is targeted for an earlier version of the .NET Framework. 该函数可确保，类型字符串的格式正确的.NET framework 目标版本更新的配置文件时。The function makes sure that type strings are formatted correctly for the targeted version of the .NET Framework when configuration files are updated.
